ticket.subject: Login page not responding
ticket.description: The login page becomes unresponsive after I enter my credentials. The submit button just spins and nothing happens. This started this morning.

ticket.subject: Add multi-language support
ticket.description: Please add support for multiple languages. At minimum, Spanish, French, and German would be very helpful for our international users.

ticket.subject: Credit card declined incorrectly
ticket.description: My credit card keeps getting declined even though I called the bank and they confirmed there are no issues on their end. Please check your payment processor.

ticket.subject: App freezes when editing profiles
ticket.description: The mobile app freezes completely whenever I try to edit a profile. I have to force close and restart the app. Steps to reproduce: Open app, go to profile, tap edit, app freezes.

ticket.subject: Dashboard widgets not updating
ticket.description: The widgets on my dashboard show old data from last week and don't update even when I refresh the page manually.

ticket.subject: Cannot change email address
ticket.description: I'm trying to update my email address in account settings but the save button is grayed out. My new email is properly formatted.

ticket.subject: Suggestion: Add keyboard shortcuts
ticket.description: Would be great to have keyboard shortcuts for common actions like save, delete, and search. This would improve productivity significantly.

ticket.subject: Charged for cancelled subscription
ticket.description: I cancelled my subscription on the 5th of last month but was still charged on the 15th. Need a full refund for this charge.

ticket.subject: Form validation error message unclear
ticket.description: When I submit a form with invalid data, the error message just says 'Invalid input' without explaining what field is wrong or why. Expected: Specific error messages for each field. Actual: Generic error message.

ticket.subject: File upload size limit
ticket.description: What is the maximum file size for uploads? I'm trying to upload a 25MB file and it's failing with no error message.

ticket.subject: Enhance filtering options
ticket.description: The current filtering options are very basic. Would love to see advanced filters with AND/OR logic, date ranges, and saved filter presets.

ticket.subject: Security: Weak password accepted
ticket.description: The system accepted my password '123456' which is extremely weak. This is a security vulnerability. You should enforce stronger password requirements.

ticket.subject: API documentation incomplete
ticket.description: The API documentation is missing important information about authentication headers and request rate limits. Please update the docs with complete examples.

ticket.subject: Cannot access premium features
ticket.description: I upgraded to premium yesterday but still can't access any premium features. My account still shows as free tier even though payment went through.

ticket.subject: Database connection errors
ticket.description: Getting frequent 'database connection failed' errors throughout the day. This is making the system unreliable. Errors occur randomly, not at specific times.

ticket.subject: Invoice download not working
ticket.description: When I click the download invoice button, I get a 404 error. Need to download invoices for tax purposes urgently.

ticket.subject: Add support for custom fields
ticket.description: Would be extremely useful to have the ability to create custom fields for our specific use case. Different organizations have different data needs.

ticket.subject: Sorting not working on tables
ticket.description: When I click the column headers to sort tables, nothing happens. Sorting should work on all columns but currently doesn't work at all.

ticket.subject: Memory leak in web application
ticket.description: The web application has a memory leak. After keeping the browser tab open for a few hours, it consumes over 2GB of RAM and becomes very slow.

ticket.subject: Upgrade plan comparison
ticket.description: Can you send me a detailed comparison of features between the Standard and Premium plans? Want to make sure upgrade is worth it for our team.

ticket.subject: Add export to Google Sheets
ticket.description: Please add direct export to Google Sheets. Currently I have to download CSV then upload to Sheets which is inefficient.

ticket.subject: Footer links broken
ticket.description: Several links in the footer (Privacy Policy, Terms of Service, About Us) are broken and return 404 errors. Minor issue but should be fixed.

ticket.subject: Timeout error on large imports
ticket.description: When I try to import files with more than 1000 records, I get a timeout error. Need to import 5000 records for data migration.

ticket.subject: Auto-logout too frequent
ticket.description: The system logs me out automatically every 10 minutes which is very annoying when I'm actively working. Can this timeout be increased?

ticket.subject: Critical: Production API down
ticket.description: The production API is completely down. All our services are affected. This is a critical emergency affecting thousands of users. Need immediate attention!

ticket.subject: Add role-based access control
ticket.description: Need role-based access control (RBAC) to manage permissions for different team members. Some should only view, others can edit, etc.

ticket.subject: Discount code validation issue
ticket.description: Applied discount code SUMMER20 at checkout but it says invalid even though the email says it's valid until end of month. Please verify and apply discount.

ticket.subject: Date picker shows wrong format
ticket.description: The date picker displays dates in MM/DD/YYYY format but I need DD/MM/YYYY for our region. Expected: Regional date format. Actual: US format only.

ticket.subject: Email notifications not being sent
ticket.description: I'm not receiving any email notifications anymore even though they're enabled in settings. Checked spam folder and email is correct.

ticket.subject: Small UI suggestion
ticket.description: The submit button could be more prominent. Maybe use a brighter color or make it slightly larger. Just a small UX improvement suggestion.
